otherNames: Moshi Fanren, Bloody Valentine, Mortals of the Doom, Mạt Thế Phàm Nhân, The Last Human, 末世凡人, 블러디발렌타인:인류종말, 凡人默示录 动态漫画
synopsis: Zuo Tian Cheng is the last living human in a mutated zombie-infested city. Just when he was sure he'd died, he finds his soul returned to just before that ill-fated day ten years ago. He swears he'll protect the people important to him this time round and reunite with his past lover. Watch his struggles to survive equipped with his memory of the next ten years!
